description.narrative: Support to UN Women Bolivia for a project on gender equality.

Sverige och Sida stödjer UN Women internationellt och genom många landskontor, men inte tidigare det relativt nya kontoret i Bolivia. Syftet med denna insats är förbättra att jämställdheten bland män och kvinnor i Bolivia, bland annat genom kompetens utveckling. Man kommer genomföra utbildningsaktiviteter för kvinnor i den politiska sektorn och öka kvinnors delaktighet. Insatsen kommer att fokusera på jämställdhetsfrågor i offentlig politik genom kommitteer och samtalsgrupper, för att diskutera fram förslag till åtgärder för att förbättra jämställdheten i det Bolivianska samhället.

To promote gender equality and implementation of public policies, and capacity building for women at parlamental, municipality and regional level.External risks is the frequent changes of personal in the political sector, that could challenge the interventions outcome.

Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: This project was a pilot project during the period 2016- 2017 with an extension to June 2018. During the intervention period (2016) the achieved results are: 1. A national coordination committee has been implemented with 9 departmental committees and 6 thematical groups.2. Public policies on gender equality has been introduced within the municipalities planing systems. 3. The recomendations from CEDAW comitte has been introduced in municipal plannsystems. The quality of the results report is weak. The cooperation partner’s capacity to apply RBM is low, and the capacity of learn from results information and to adapt to the context is also deficient. The narrative report was focused on showing the actions and activities executed within the framework of the project, however, as established in the agreement, the report should have an analytical focus and include a presentation of the progress made in the implementation of programs and projects towards the achievement of established results. In this line, recommendation has been done to analyse strategic aspects related to the results obtained during the pilot phase of the project.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
